trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required by aggregates in a <see langword="GroupBy" /> clause.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see langword="GroupBy" /> 子句中彙總 (Aggregate) 所需的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: Aggregates are pseudo-expressions, and are severely restricted in where they can appear.
trans-unit.target: 彙總是虛擬運算式，而且它們可以出現的位置具有嚴格限制。

trans-unit.source: Aggregates can only appear in the aggregates clause of a `GroupBy` expression.
trans-unit.target: 彙總的彙總子句中只能出現`GroupBy`運算式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of expressions that define the arguments to this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate" /> 之引數的運算式清單。

trans-unit.source: The list of expressions that define the arguments to this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate" /> 之引數的運算式清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate.Arguments%2A> property of <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate> describes the arguments to the aggregate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate.Arguments%2A> 的 <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate> 屬性會描述彙總的引數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the result type of this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate" /> 的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate.ResultType%2A> property describes the result type of the aggregate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate.ResultType%2A> 屬性會描述彙總的結果型別。
